config_title.message: You can specify a tag, a class or a combination of both to identify both Target and Container elements.

config_target_hint.message: This selector helps FilterOut to find what you want to delete.

config_container_hint.message: This selector identifies the block that contains the content to hide.

about_text.message: Filter the contents you don't want to see from web pages.

no_config.message: There's no configuration for this site.
